document_data.name: ''The Rival Orc Tribes & their Great Battles''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Rival Orc Tribes & their Great Battles''''' was a historic account of the [[orc]]s arrival to [[Toril]], written and published before the [[Wailing Death]] crisis of [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Contents: ''The Rival Orc Tribes & their Great Battles'' told the history of the [[Mulhorand]]i [[wizards]] opening magic ''[[gate]]s'' into the world of orcs. That subsequently led to an invasion that was known as the [[Orcgate Wars]] during which the Mulhorand and [[Unther]] pantheons fought the orcish goods. The Orcgate Wars led to multiple divine deaths and facilitated the god [[Gilgeam]]'s almost two-thousand-year tyranny of Unther.
document_data.History: Copies of ''the Rival Orc Tribes & their Great Battles'' book could be found around the areas of [[Neverwinter]], [[Daggerford]], and the [[Sword Coast North]]  ''circa'' 1372 DR.
